sentences.en: A loose mulch acts on the surface as an insulator.
sentences.cn: 疏松的覆盖物在土壤表面起了隔热的作用.

sentences.en: AMD switched to silicon - on - insulator ( SOI ); Intel stayed with bulk silicon.
sentences.cn: AMD转向了 绝缘体上硅 ( SOI ), 而intel仍然使用体硅.

sentences.en: Any two conductors separated by an insulator are said to form a capacitor.
sentences.cn: 由绝缘体隔开任何两个导体就组成电容器.

sentences.en: Dry air is a good insulator, but sea water is not.
sentences.cn: 干燥空气是一种好绝缘物, 海水则不是.

sentences.en: Even in an insulator the electrons can move about without leaving their parent atoms or molecules.
sentences.cn: 甚至在绝缘体内,电子也能不离开它所属的原子或分子而运动.

sentences.en: Fat is an excellent insulator against the cold.
sentences.cn: 脂肪是极好的抵御寒冷的绝热体。

sentences.en: For the insulator investigated the 50 % flashover voltage is reduced by 23.4 %.
sentences.cn: 实验表明表面电荷积聚使得绝缘子沿面闪络电压的降低竟然达到23.4%.

sentences.en: In a hot climate the condensation will be on the inner surface of the insulator.
sentences.cn: 在气候炎热时,凝结水将出现在隔热层的内表面.

sentences.en: It is insulator but its thermal conductivity is better than Cu.
sentences.cn: 它本身是绝缘体,其导热能力优于铜,并能承受极高的强电场.

sentences.en: Our company mainly produce Post insulator, Pin insulator and Porcelain Bushing.
sentences.cn: 公司主要生产以出口为主的柱式绝缘子 、 针式绝缘子及瓷套.

sentences.en: Shellac also happened to be an effective electrical insulator.
sentences.cn: 紫胶恰巧还是一种有效的绝缘物.

sentences.en: The atoms of an insulator hold their electrons very tight.
sentences.cn: 绝缘体的原子把电子抓得很牢.

sentences.en: The FRP is an insulator to electricity, so it is good in safety.
sentences.cn: 因FRP材质 不导电, 因而灯杆用电安全性能好.

sentences.en: The productuses 4 pairs, Insulation is HDPE insulator, and sheath is PVC.
sentences.cn: 1本产品规格为4对, 绝缘采用高密度聚乙烯绝缘料, 护套为聚氯乙烯护套料.

sentences.en: Transmission Support Spacer to Insulator Mounting Plate & ndash; ( 4 wd )
sentences.cn: 至绝缘器安装板的变速箱支撑隔板– ( 4轮驱动 )

words.tran_cn: 隔离，使孤立；使绝缘，使隔热
[电][物]绝缘体；从事绝缘工作的工人

trans.tran_cn: 绝缘，隔热或隔音等的物质或装置，隔离者，隔离物，隔振子，隔电子
trans.tran_en: a material or object which does not allow electricity, heat, or sound to pass through it
